XbeeModule module¶

exception XbeeModule.CommunicationError(message)¶

Bases: XbeeModule.Error

Exception raised for errors in the response from xbee.

Attributes:

expression – input that in which the error occurred message – explanation of the error

exception XbeeModule.Error¶

Bases: Exception

class XbeeModule.Xbee(portName, baudrate, address, apiMode=False, S1=False, timeout=2)¶

Bases: object

applyChanges(baudChange=None)¶

Applies changes with ATWR followed by ATAC :Params buardRate(optional) Will change serial port baud rate

create16BitAddrFrame(data, address=0, mode=0, stringData=True)¶

Creates frame to API Specification. Working but not verifed recently

enableAPIMode()¶

Enters API Mode: See page 81 in user manual

enableS1Compatability()¶

Enables compatablity with S1 device

enableTransparentMode()¶

Enters transparent mode: See page 81 in user manual

enterCommandMode()¶

Writes +++ to device Warning:: resets the input buffer

exitCommandMode()¶

Writes ATCN

flowControl(enableFlag)¶

Enables or disables RTS/CTS flow control. See page 43 :params: enableFlag (boolen) 1.True-> enable flow control 2. False -> disable flow control

getBaudRate()¶

Determines the serial baud rate stored in BD register :Warning Enters command mode automatically :returns 0 -> error entering command mode, 1 -> Other error occured,

None -> No error occured

getDestAddr()¶

Returns desination address in the form of bytes

getMy16BitAddress()¶
packetizationTimeout()¶
read(packetSize=32)¶

Reads bytes from input buffer :Params packetSize=32; configurable to read number of bytes from input buffer :Returns bytes from input buffer

readSerialData()¶

Reads API frame

setBaud115k()¶

Sets buard rate to 250000 :Warning:: enters command mode automatically :returns: 1. 0 -> error entering command mode, 2. 1 -> Other error occured,

  1. None -> No error occured

setBaud250K()¶

Sets buard rate to 250000 :Warning enters command mode automatically :returns 0 -> error entering command mode, 1 -> Other error occured,

None -> No error occured

setChannel(channelNumber)¶

Sets operation channel. See page 227 :params byte in range 0x0B - 0x1A

setDH(address)¶
setDH16Addr()¶
setDL(address)¶
setMM()¶
setMinGaurdTime()¶

Sets the guard time to the smallest possible value. page (241)

setMy16BitAddress(address)¶
setTxPowerLevel(powerLevel)¶

Sets Tx Power level :Params bytes in range 0-4

transmit(data, address)¶

Transmits data to address specified. Changes address if it does not match

transmitSerialData(data, address, stringData=True)¶

Creates API frame before transmitting

validateCommandResponse()¶
Check response from Xbee device
return

(boolean) 1. True->’OK

‘ 2. False-> ‘ERROR ‘

write(message)¶

Writes and flushes message to xbee deives. Waits for response from device

Param

message (bytes)

Returns

none

Raises

CommunicationError
